skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I specialize in building responsive, high-performance user interfaces using React, Next.js, TypeScript, Animation-UI and Tailwind CSS. I ensure seamless user experiences with clean, maintainable code.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Experienced in developing robust APIs and server-side logic using Node.js, Express.js, Python (Flask & FastAPI) and Appwrite. I focus on secure, scalable, and efficient backend solutions.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: Skilled in designing intuitive and visually appealing interfaces with a user-centric approach. I utilize Figma and Adobe XD to create wireframes and prototypes that enhance usability.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Proficient in building custom websites and landing pages on Webflow, combining design creativity with development efficiency to deliver pixel-perfect projects.

testimonial.description: He completed my work on time and made it exactly the way I imagined. It was a great experience working with him.
I don't know much about technology, but Pradhuman explained everything patiently. Now my site works perfectly on mobile too.
At first I wasn't sure about hiring a freelancer, but he truly won my trust. He delivered even better than what was promised.
I wanted a website but had no idea where to start. Pradhuman helped me at every step. Now everyone appreciates how it looks!
He's a simple guy but does outstanding work. Quick responses, friendly nature, and great technical knowledge â€” everything was top-notch.
